00020 #ifndef OB_CHARGEMODEL_H
00021 #define OB_CHARGEMODEL_H
00022 
00023 #include <openbabel/babelconfig.h>
00024 #include <openbabel/plugin.h>
00025 
00026 namespace OpenBabel
00027 {
00028 class OBMol; //Forward declaration; used only as pointer.
00029 
00030 class OBAPI OBChargeModel : public OBPlugin
00031 {
00032   MAKE_PLUGIN(OBChargeModel)
00033 
00034   public:
00035     const char* TypeID(){return "charges";};
00036 
00039     virtual bool ComputeCharges(OBMol &) { return false; }
00040 
00043     const std::vector<double> & GetFormalCharges() const
00044     { return m_formalCharges; }
00045 
00048     const std::vector<double> & GetPartialCharges() const
00049     { return m_partialCharges; }
00050 
00051  protected:
00052       std::vector<double> m_partialCharges;
00053       std::vector<double> m_formalCharges;
00054 
00056       void FillChargeVectors(OBMol &mol);
00057 };
00058 
00059 }//namespace
00060 #endif
